roomname.explanation: Literally Outer Space
The overall area that the game takes place in.
The dimension exploring spaceship
An endgame section containing achievement trophys
One of the stages

One of the stages

roomname.english: I Can't Believe You Got This Far
roomname.translation: Não acredito que você chegou tão longe
roomname.explanation: If you're playing No Death Mode, the room Prize for the Reckless has this roomname instead (the room is altered to make it possible to do this section without dying)

roomname.english: Imagine Spikes There, if You Like
roomname.explanation: If you're playing a time trial, the room Prize for the Reckless has this roomname instead (the room is altered to make it possible to do this section without dying)
Named after the Hitchcock film (The final stage has room names that suggest old black and white TV shows.)
Named after the 1954 film (The final stage has room names that suggest old black and white TV shows.)
Before it was a film, the Untouchables was a TV series in 1959 (The final stage has room names that suggest old black and white TV shows.)
Refers to Television Newsreel. (The final stage has room names that suggest old black and white TV shows.)
(Second part of the final stage has references to Colour TV shows)
Reference to early black and white sitcom Bewitched (The final stage has room names that suggest old black and white TV shows.)
Named after the Hitchcock film (Second part of the final stage has references to Colour TV shows)
Gunsmoke was a black and white Western (The final stage has room names that suggest old black and white TV shows.)
Gunsmoke changed to colour in 1966 (Second part of the final stage has references to Colour TV shows)
